name: Österreichische Hoteliervereinigung - Austrian Hotel Association
goal:
The Austrian Hotel Association (ÖHV) has shaped the framework for modern entrepreneurship as the voluntary and independent representative of Austria’s leading hotels since 1953. About 1,400 member establishments generate a turnover of approx. EUR 3,5 billion more than 160,000 beds and about 40,000 employees.

The goals of the Austrian Hotel Associaton are to bring forward Austrian and European tourism policy and provide SMEs like hotels better framework conditions in fields like labour, taxes or infrastructure/mobility.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Taxation
euInitiatives: Guiding Policy Principles on Short Term Accommodation Rentals;  Digital Single Market Strategy
